description: Schema definition for logging helm chart values

persistence.description: Persistence properties for the logging component

enabled.description: Specifies whether you store logs on a persistent volume instead of a volatile mounted volume.

size.description: Defines the size of the persistent volume.

config.description: Configuration properties for the logging component

auth_enabled.description: Authenticates the tenant sending the request to the logging service when Loki runs in the multi-tenant mode. Setting it to `true` requires authentication using the HTTP (X-Scope-OrgID) header. Since Kyma supports the single-tenant mode only, you must set this parameter to `false`. This way, Loki does not require the `X-Scope-OrgID` and the tenant ID defaults to `fake`.

ingester.description: Defining the properties for the ingester.

lifecycler.description: Defining the lifecycler properties of the ingester.

address.description: Specifies the address of the lifecycler that coordinates distributed logging services.

ring.description: Defining the ring properties of the lifecycler.

store.description: Specifies the storage for information on logging data and their copies.

replication_factor.description: Specifies the number of data copies on separate storages.

schema_configs.description: Configuration properties for the logging schema

form.description: Specifies the date from which index data is stored.

store.description: Specifies the storage type. boltdb is an embedded key-value storage that stores the index data.

object_store.description: Specifies if you use local or cloud storages for data.

schema.description: Defines the schema version that Loki provides.

prefix.description: Specifies the prefix added to all index file names to distinguish them from log chunks.

period.description: Defines how long indexes and log chunks are retained.

storage_config.description: Configuration properties for the logging storage.

directory.description: Specifies the physical location of indexes in boltdb.

filesystem.description: Defining the filesystem for the storage

directory.description: Specifies the physical location of log chunks in filesystem.
